# Inverse Square Root LUT
# Size: 256 entries
# INPUT_DIVISOR: 128 (var_hw / 128 = index)
# OUTPUT_SCALE: 16384 (LUT[i] / 16384 = 1/sqrt)
# Formula: LUT[i] = round((1 / sqrt(i / 128)) * 16384)
#
# Usage in C:
#   int index = (int)(var_hw / 128);
#   if (index > 255) index = 255;
#   uint8_t lut_val = INV_SQRT_LUT[index];
#   float result = (float)lut_val / 16384;
#
256
255
255
255
255
255
